name: Harmonia
author: Ned Zimmerman

sections.description:
Inspired by the late-lamented Delicious Playtagger, Harmonia turns any link to an MP3 or M4A file into a minimalist inline audio player using jPlayer.

  • Tested in Chrome, Firefox, IE 8+, Safari and Mobile Safari (iPhone and iPad)
  • Uses HTML5 audio where available with Flash fallback
  • Zero configuration

The code herein was initially developed for the fine folks at Said the Gramophone.
sections.installation: Download and unzip Harmonia, upload it to your plugins directory, activate the plugin, and you’re good to go.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Tested for 3.8 compatibility.

1.0.2

  • Fixed Firefox bug

1.0.1

  • Removed line break before player
  • Added donation link

1.0

  • Initial release
